name: Simple Certain Time to Show Content
author: Mitchell Bennis - Element Engage, LLC

sections.description:
At a time of your choosing, show or hide anything enclosed within these shortcode tags:

[eeSCTSC]Your content here[/eeSCTSC]

Can be used on a Page, Post in a Text Widget, or in a theme file with do_shortcode().

  • Schedule the days of the week to show content, then:
  • Schedule the time of the day to show or hide what’s inside the tags.
  • Set the proper timezone to show the content.
  • Optionally show alternate content (text or HTML) when the main content is not showing.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
